BUGMAX.Notes: Maximum value of bug to be used as reference to build the scale function of the altitude control (extracted from the path-planning trajectory)

GHVMAX.Notes: Maximum value of ghv to be used as reference to build the scale function of the down-range control  (extracted from the path-planning

ObsDs.Notes: Observer time constant of the down-range

ObsDv.Notes: Observer time constant of the velocity

ObsDh.Notes: Observer time constant of the altitude

ObsDfpa.Notes: Observer time constant of the FPA

StFdbkH.Notes: State feedback time constant of the altitude closed loop

StFdbkS1.Notes: First state feedback time constant of the down-range closed loop

StFdbkS2.Notes: Second state feedback time constant of the down-range closed loop

STPDWNDUR.Notes: Duration of the stepdown function to turn off the down-range closed loop component of the down-range control law

TSTPDWN.Notes: Time to start the stepdown function to turn off the down-range closed loop component of the down-range control law

ugMax.Notes: Maximum commanded value of the cosine of the bank angle

ugMin.Notes: Minimum commanded value of the cosine of the bank angle

DistF_H.Notes: Flag to automatically turn ON/OFF the altitude control disturbance compensation portion of the control law

DistF_S.Notes: Flag to automatically turn ON/OFF the down-range control disturbance compensation portion of the control law

StateFF_H.Notes: Flag to automatically turn ON/OFF the altitude control closed loop portion of the control law

StateFF_S.Notes: Flag to automatically turn ON/OFF the down-range control closed loop portion of the control law

DrObsFlagH.Notes: Flag to automatically turn ON/OFF the altitude control observer

DrObsFlagS.Notes: Flag to automatically turn ON/OFF the downrange control observer

CrClFlag.Notes: Flag to automatically turn ON/OFF the lateral control

GuiFlag.Notes: Flag to automatically turn ON/OFF the path-planning computation
